summary: Follows the choices made by three young women - one a drug dealer, one an addict, one a pregnant teen - in Jersey City.
cast: Anny Mariano|Judy Marte|Paola Mendoza|Dominic Colón|Flaco Navaja|Danny Rivera|Clarence B. Hutchinson|Earl Thomason|Rokafella|Kamilah Forbes|Raven Hamilton|Gloria Zelaya|Autumn Collier|Nikki Jean|Julian Mohamed|Shanaine Osbourne|Hannah Bernall|Gandja Monteiro|Maribel Lizardo|Edward O'Blenis|Levon Fickling|Edward Pagan|Kim Howard|Julian James|Bonz Malone|Adepero Oduye
title: On the Outs
